context: Politically, the Marshall Islands is a <a0_0><a8_0>presidential republic<a8_0/><a0_0/> in free association with <a1_0>the United States<a1_0/>, with the US providing defense, subsidies, and access to U.S. based agencies such as <a5_0>the FCC<a5_0/> and the USPS. With few natural resources, the islands' wealth is based on a <a2_0><a6_0>service<a6_0/><a2_0/> economy, as well as some fishing and agriculture; <a3_0>aid<a3_0/> from <a9_0>the United States<a9_0/> represents a large percentage of the islands' gross domestic product. The country uses <a4_0>the <a7_0>United States dollar<a7_0/><a4_0/> as its currency.
